name: Super Floppy
description:
Description :

Happy Bird : Tap to flap your wings Go as far as you can avoiding pipes and wild flowers.
Fun game for all the family

How to play :

- Tap to flap your wings to fly.
- Avoid pipes (Don't Touch The Pipes ,The ground ).
- Try to get 4 medals: Bronze, Silver, Gold (hard), Platinum (very hard).
- Share your best score over social media or via SMS/MMS/Email and compete your friends.
.
